name: Onmund's Request
description: Onmund asks for help recovering a family amulet he regrets selling. The trail leads into the College's gray-market politics (and possibly local Winterhold resentment).

objectives.description: Identify who currently holds the amulet (Enthir / black-market contact).
Recover the amulet: negotiate, trade, steal, or win it.
Return the amulet to Onmund (or decide its fate).

items: Onmund's Amulet (aspect hook; optional minor warding benefit)

reputation.reason: Helped recover a student's family heirloom.
Recovered and returned his family amulet.

consequences.success: Onmund regains his family amulet and grows to trust the party more, clarifying College black-market dynamics.
consequences.failure: Onmund remains conflicted or resentful and the amulet stays in circulation or is lost, shifting future College politics.

notes: Completing this quest unlocks Onmund as a stable companion pick for dangerous expeditions. Use this quest to explore College of Winterhold politics and Onmund's values. Adjust outcomes based on whether the amulet is returned, destroyed, or repurposed.
gm_notes: Great place to introduce Enthir, quiet College corruption, and 'neutral institution' hypocrisy. If PC leans noble/political, this can become a leverage scene.
